archimate:Requirement.name: 4.54.5 Collaboration platform infrastructure securirity control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: The security of collaboration platform infrastructure should be improved by: employing a standard configuration for each platform hardening collaboration platform servers (e.g. by locking down the op-erating system and application) configuring firewalls to block the use of unauthorised collaboration platforms (e.g. by blocking known ports).
